text.section:
The manufacturer, packer, or distributor of any prescription drug that is sold or distributed in this State shall:
Keep correct copies of any printed matter that is:
Required to be included in any package in which the drug is sold or distributed; or
Approved under the federal act; and
Send copies of the printed matter to any health practitioner who is authorized to administer the drug and who makes a written request for information about the drug.
This section does not exempt any person from any labeling requirement imposed under any other provision of this subtitle.
